entry.title: EU formally launches civilian mission along Armenia-Azerbaijan border

media:group.media:title: EU formally launches civilian mission along Armenia-Azerbaijan border
media:group.media:description:
üìçThe European Union‚Äôs 100-strong civilian mission to Armenia was launched today. üìçArmenia‚Äôs gross domestic product grew by 12.6% in 2022, according to the country‚Äôs Statistical Committee, marking an all-time high in Armenia‚Äôs economic growth rate.
